metadata.title: CVE-2021-47394 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: unlink table before deleting it syzbot reportsfollowing UAF: BUG: KASAN: use-after-free in memcmp+0x18f/0x1c0lib/string.c:955 nla_strcmp+0xf2/0x130 lib/nlattr.c:836nft_table_lookup.part.0+0x1a2/0x460 net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:570nft_table_lookup net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:4064 [inline]nf_tables_getset+0x1b3/0x860 net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:4064nfnetlink_rcv_msg+0x659/0x13f0 net/netfilter/nfnetlink.c:285netlink_rcv_skb+0x153/0x420 net/netlink/af_netlink.c:2504 Problem is thatall get operations are lockless, so the commit_mutex held bynft_rcv_nl_event() isn't enough to stop a parallel GET request from doingread-accesses to the table object even after synchronize_rcu(). To avoidthis, unlink the table first and store the table objects in on-stackscratch space.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
